QuestData.Title: Eeling in a Big One
QuestData.Description:
If you are up to it, I have an idea to give the naga an amusing surprise.
<Rikal slowly pulls out a scroll and waves it in your face.>
I need some teeth from marine predators to cast the spell though. Luckily, the naga brought some disgusting eels with them. Go gather their fangs, and bring them back to me.
QuestData.CompletionText: I can't wait to see how this goes.
QuestData.RewardText: That's exactly what I'm looking for. Give me a bit of time to prepare the spell.
